overview: Hunky Jake Cannon hits the beach, runs into surfer stud Drew Nolan and recounts his sexual trysts. Chi Chi LaRue directs, so you know you'll see lots of hot cocks in and out of sweet butts and hungry mouths.  This was Jake's first or second movie and he's totally adorable. Don't miss the "bloopers" at the end for a demonstration of Jake's charm and naturalness.
title: Beached
